languages.text: "С этим устройством ты не перестала быть ведьмой. Даже хуже — я затрудняюсь сказать, во что тебя превращает ксеносская удавка".
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Idira's second quest. Idira is now wearing a psy-stifler.
Idira: "Silence... Blessed silence... I never thought my head could be so quiet..."

traits.locale_text: "С этим устройством ты не перестала быть ведьмой. Даже хуже — я затрудняюсь сказать, во что тебя превращает ксеносская удавка".

languages.text: "Even with that device on, you are still a witch. In fact, you've become something worse — there is no telling what this xenos-made noose is turning you into."
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Idira's second quest. Idira is now wearing a psy-stifler.
Idira: "Silence... Blessed silence... I never thought my head could be so quiet..."
languages.original_text: "С этим устройством ты не перестала быть ведьмой. Даже хуже — я затрудняюсь сказать, во что тебя превращает ксеносская удавка".

traits.locale_text: "Even with that device on, you are still a witch. In fact, you've become something worse — there is no telling what this xenos-made noose is turning you into."
"Even with that device on, you are still a witch. In fact, you've become something worse — there is no telling what this xenos-made noose is turning you into."
"Even with that device on, you are still a witch. In fact, you've become something worse — there is no telling what this xenos-made noose is turning you into."
"Even with that device on, you are still a witch. In fact, you've become something worse — there is no telling what this xenos-made noose is turning you into."
"Even with that device on, you are still a witch. In fact, you've become something worse — there is no telling what this xenos-made noose is turning you into."
"Even with that device on, you are still a witch. In fact, you've become something worse — there is no telling what this xenos-made noose is turning you into."

languages.text: 「その装置をつけていようが、お前は依然として魔女だ。いや、むしろ以前よりも悪質になった。この異種族製の絞首縄が、お前を何に変えているのか、誰にもわからない」
languages.original_text: "Even with that device on, you are still a witch. In fact, you've become something worse — there is no telling what this xenos-made noose is turning you into."

traits.locale_text: 「その装置をつけていようが、お前は依然として魔女だ。いや、むしろ以前よりも悪質になった。この異種族製の絞首縄が、お前を何に変えているのか、誰にもわからない」

languages.text: "Selbst mit diesem Gerät bleibt Ihr eine Hexe. Ihr seid sogar noch etwas viel Schlimmeres geworden. Es lässt sich unmöglich sorgen, in was diese Xenos-Schlinge Euch verwandeln wird."
languages.original_text: "Even with that device on, you are still a witch. In fact, you've become something worse — there is no telling what this xenos-made noose is turning you into."

traits.locale_text: "Selbst mit diesem Gerät bleibt Ihr eine Hexe. Ihr seid sogar noch etwas viel Schlimmeres geworden. Es lässt sich unmöglich sorgen, in was diese Xenos-Schlinge Euch verwandeln wird."

languages.text: « Même avec cet appareil, vous restez une sorcière. À vrai dire, vous êtes devenue quelque chose de bien pire. Nous n'avons pas la moindre idée de ce que ce carcan xénos va faire de vous. »
languages.original_text: "Even with that device on, you are still a witch. In fact, you've become something worse — there is no telling what this xenos-made noose is turning you into."

traits.locale_text: « Même avec cet appareil, vous restez une sorcière. À vrai dire, vous êtes devenue quelque chose de bien pire. Nous n'avons pas la moindre idée de ce que ce carcan xénos va faire de vous. »

languages.text: «Aun con ese artilugio que lleva, sigue siendo una bruja. De hecho, ahora es todavía peor: a saber en qué la ha convertido esta soga de tecnología xenos».
languages.original_text: "Even with that device on, you are still a witch. In fact, you've become something worse — there is no telling what this xenos-made noose is turning you into."

traits.locale_text: «Aun con ese artilugio que lleva, sigue siendo una bruja. De hecho, ahora es todavía peor: a saber en qué la ha convertido esta soga de tecnología xenos».

languages.text: “即便戴上了那个东西，你也还是女巫。说真的，你甚至连女巫都不如了，没人知道那个异形制造的套索会把你变成什么样子。”
languages.original_text: "Even with that device on, you are still a witch. In fact, you've become something worse — there is no telling what this xenos-made noose is turning you into."

traits.locale_text: “即便戴上了那个东西，你也还是女巫。说真的，你甚至连女巫都不如了，没人知道那个异形制造的套索会把你变成什么样子。”

languages.text: "O cihaza rağmen özünde bir cadısın, hatta daha da betersin. O zeno tasmasının seni neye dönüştürdüğü belli değil."
languages.original_text: "Even with that device on, you are still a witch. In fact, you've become something worse — there is no telling what this xenos-made noose is turning you into."

traits.locale_text: "O cihaza rağmen cadıdan ibaretsin, hatta daha da betersin. O zeno tasmasının seni neye dönüştürdü, belli değil."

languages.original_text: "Even with that device on, you are still a witch. In fact, you've become something worse — there is no telling what this xenos-made noose is turning you into."
